channel.title: [unsolved] Couple Problems With PI
channel.description:
I honestly don't like posting in the help section but i've tried a lot of things to get this stuff to work. My first problem is with Gs stances when holding them. The spec looks fine when you do it but when holding it looks like this: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/24dn4bd.png[/img]
I've tried a lot of things to fix but none have worked.
My next problem is with korasi. I added all the special effects and such but I cannot get the special bar to appear below it. I've tried several things in itemassistant but they didn't work.
The final thing is more of just telling me where to find something, where the veng skull gfx is because I need to change it.
Thanks ~marcbob

Hm… That’s very odd.

Very. It’s why I posted a topic about this stuff lol

item.title: [unsolved] Couple Problems With PI
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:3, topic:395862”]Well, I can’t help with #1, but I can try to help with the others.

  1. Search for if(c.specAmount >= 5) { and above that add case 18786: and the special bar should appear.

  2. In PlayerAssistant class public void castVeng() { has the GFX in that.[/quote]

Found the veng and it worked. Still no cigar with korasi.

Read full topic

item.title: [unsolved] Couple Problems With PI
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

For the first 1, The client has newer and the server has older. I had to change a lot of stuff on the server but I’ve tried changing everything for godswords and it hasn’t worked.

  1. This is what I put for the spec bar in itemassistant:
    case 18786: //korasi
    c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7599);
    specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7611);
    break;

  2. I searched through clickingbuttons and combatassistant and found nothing relating to gfx or anim for veng.

Read full topic
